meanings.definition: A plant of the pink family with white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The silene in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a silene to put in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid his acorns under the silene.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as delicate as a silene in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The silene swayed gently in the breeze, like a dancer on stage.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the pink family.
meanings.sent1: Many silene species are found in the wild.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different varieties of silene.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners joked that the silene plants were having a family reunion.

meanings.sent5: Each silene plant in the genus seemed to have its own personality.
